sense.def:
To feel sick
pomeni, da nam gre na bruhanje.

seg.quote: Flying always makes me feel sick.

sense.def:
To be sick of something
pomeni, da nas nekaj jezi ali dolgočasi in da želimo, da bi se tisto končalo.

seg.quote: We're sick of sitting around waiting for something to happen.

sense.def:
Zgodba ali šala, ki je
sick
, na neprijetno neresen način govori o smrti ali trpljenju.

seg.quote: She made a rather sick joke.

sense.def:
To be sick
pomeni izločiti zaužito hrano skozi usta.

seg.quote: I think I'm going to be sick.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
makes someone sick
, je nekdo zaradi tistega jezen ali ogorčen.

seg.quote: It makes me sick the way they waste our money.

sense.def:
To be worried sick
pomeni biti izjemno zaskrbljen;

seg.quote: He was worried sick that the factory might close.
